alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Marion; Monroe; St. Clair; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 2:30AM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois, including the following areas, Clinton IL, Marion IL, Monroe IL, Saint Clair and Washington IL. Portions of east central Missouri, including the following area, Jefferson MO. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Total rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches can be expected throughout the Watch area, with locally higher amounts possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Clinton; Marion; Monroe; St. Clair; Washington
